name: RDP protocol specialist needed
short_description:
Hello, My apologies for sending using this forum for this.... I am looking for a RDP Protocol expert for a very dynamic mobile development company in Mississauga Ontario. They are looking for someone either contract or full time to enhance their mobile development team. They have just gone public and they need this person asap. I do not know where to start on my search; do you know someone that would be interested in this role or where I can start my search for these type of skill: knows how the source code… someone who knows how the source code under the covers. ? 
Any assistance is greatly appreciated on how to find these resources.  
Tamara Thulean
Nexus Group Inc
summary: Requiring a RDP Protocol Specialist: urgent help needed!
